sql.query: INSERT INTO articles (article_id, locale, user_id, journal_id, section_id, language, comments_to_ed, citations, date_submitted, last_modified, date_status_modified, status, submission_progress, current_round, submission_file_id, revised_file_id, review_file_id, editor_file_id, pages, fast_tracked, hide_author, comments_status) SELECT article_id, locale, user_id, journal_id, section_id, language, comments_to_ed, citations, date_submitted, last_modified, date_status_modified, status, submission_progress, current_round, submission_file_id, revised_file_id, review_file_id, editor_file_id, pages, fast_tracked, hide_author, comments_status FROM articles_old
INSERT INTO article_settings (article_id, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, locale) SELECT article_id, 'pub-id::doi', doi, 'string', '' FROM articles_old WHERE doi IS NOT NULL AND doi != ''
